description: Founded in 1995, Xavor Corporation is a global technology and management consulting firm committed to delivering quality custom solutions which enable our clients to realize significant gains in productivity and cost savings.Â Headquartered in California and Pakistan, Xavor counts more than 1000 clients globally.
